feed.title: beer at chaihuo
feed.description:
A feed to log temperatures of the insulated brewing box at http://chaihuo.org/ where we're currently brewing beer.

Shenzhen's ambient temperature is around 30°C. That's too hot for beer. We have an insulated box containing bottles of frozen ice. We replace the bottles daily. A commercial PID controller (ALTEC AL808) regulates the temperature of the brewing to 20°C.

Since September 19 2011, we start to use TEC to control the temperature, this feed now indicates the beer side temperature.

SZDIY Lab 在柴火创客空间(chaihuo.org)自酿啤酒，这个 feed 用来监测并记录啤酒发酵箱内的温度。

在之前的酿造中我们用建筑用保温泡沫自制了恒温发酵箱，内容安装半导体致冷装置进行致冷，使用了一个商业 PID 控制器 (ALTEC AL808) 来控制温度。这次没有进行温度控制，因为此时深圳的气温正好适合啤酒发酵。
feed.creator: https://xively.com/users/atommann
